name: Encased Divinity
description: At the start of battle, the top floor gains [effect0.power][corrupt] that cannot be removed.
relicLoreTooltips: Echoes are the essence of Divinity. There is no recorded history of this, and, frankly, anyone claiming this fact would be considered mad. But given my recent... revelations... I can say without a doubt that their origin is Divine.

additionalTooltips.title: Charged Echoes
additionalTooltips.description:
Add [corrupt] by playing [infused] cards. The Wurmkin use [corrupt] to power spells and abilities.

[corrupt] can exceed [emptycorrupt] but excess [corrupt] will be removed at end of turn.
